sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser'; import moment from "moment"; import { EmployerContext } from "../../../context/employer"; function ViewProposal({proposal, activeModal, closeModal, handleActionBtn}) { const {status, proposalId} = proposal; const statusName = status === "0"? "Penging Proposal" : status === "1"? "Accepted Proposal" : status === "2"? "selected Proposal" : "Rejected Proposal"; const {acceptProposal, selectProposal, rejectProposal} = useContext(EmployerContext); return (
Cover Letter

{proposal.name}

{/*
{categoryName}
*/}
    {/*
  • {proposal.category? proposal.category.name : null}
    • */}
  • {statusName}
  • {moment(proposal.birthDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}
  • {proposal.country_id}
{ (status === "0")? <> : (status === "1")? <> : null }
{ReactHtmlParser(proposal.message)}

Educations

    { proposal.educations && proposal.educations.map((item, index)=>{ return (

  • {`${item.title} in ${item.specialization}`}

    • ) }) }

Work & Experience

    { proposal.works && proposal.works.map((item, index)=>{ return (

  • {`${item.months} month as ${item.title}`}

    • ) }) }

Languages

    { proposal.languages && proposal.languages.map(item=>{ return(
  • {`${item.name} (${item.level})`}
    • ) }) }

Skills

    { proposal.skills && proposal.skills.map(item=>{ return(
  • {item.name}
    • ) }) }
) } export default ViewProposal
